name: Snowball Fight
description:
A two person platforming snowball fight, based on a tutorial by GamesPlusJames https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=p23J5-1OTAM

Controls:

  • Santa:
    • Move: Left arrow, right arrow
    • Jump: Up arrow
    • Throw: Enter
  • Snowman
    • Move: A, D
    • Jump: Space
    • Throw: F

The downloadable Windows version can be played with keyboard or game controllers.

Artwork by http://www.gamedeveloperstudio.com/

Music by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
